create_game.title: Create Your Music Game

create_game.time_limit_help: How long should players have to guess each song?

create_game.letter_click_description: Players click on letters to fill in dashes representing the song name
create_game.input_method_help: Choose how players will input their guesses.
create_game.search_add_songs: Search and add songs to create your game
